warlock.name: Lord Carver, BMMD, Esq. III

ranged_weapon.name: Sawed-off Scattergun
ranged_weapon.capacity: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation it makes a Both Barrels attack.

warlock.feat: While in Carver's control area, friendly Farrow models gain Overtake and an additional die on melee damage rolls. Hog Heaven lasts for one turn. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy warrior models with a normal melee attack, after the attack is resolved the model can immediately advance up to 1".)
warlock.spell: While in this model's control area, models in its battlegroup cannot be knocked down and gain +3 ARM but suffer –2 DEF. Batten Down the Hatches lasts for one round.
Models in this model's battlegroup currently in its control area gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.
While B2B with target friendly Faction model/unit, enemy models suffer –2 DEF and cannot advance except to change facing.
The AOE is rough terrain and remains in play for one round.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
Friendly Farrow Brigand models gain Combined Ranged Attack.
This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.
Friendly Farrow models/units in this model's command range never flee and immediately rally.

warlock.name: Bloody Barnabas

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, if the attack hit a small-based non-warlock/warcaster model the model hit is removed from play.

melee_weapon.name: Bone Cleaver
melee_weapon.capacity: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed a living enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending fury.

warlock.feat: Non-amphibious enemy models currently in Barnabas' control area are knocked down.
warlock.spell: When a living enemy model is boxed by Flesh Eater, it is removed from play and this model or a living warbeast in its battlegroup in its control area heals d3 damage points.
Target friendly warrior model/unit gains +3 DEF but suffers –1 SPD.

Place a 5" AOE anywhere completely in this model's control area where it does not touch a model's base. The AOE is shallow water and remains in play for one round. While completely in a Swamp Pit AOE, a model with Amphibious cannot be targeted by ranged attacks.

When a friendly Faction model in this model's control area destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved, one warbeast in this model's battlegroup that is in its control area can advance up to 3". A warbeast can advance only once per turn as a result of Warpath.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

When an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of this model and in its LOS, this model can immediately charge it. If it does, it cannot make another counter charge until after your next turn. This model cannot make a counter charge while engaged.
This model can have only Minion Gatorman warbeasts in its battlegroup.
While engaging an enemy model, this model gains +2 ARM.

warlock.name: Calaban, the Grave Walker

ranged_weapon.name: Heart Stopper
ranged_weapon.capacity: When a living enemy model is boxed by this attack, it heals 1 damage point. For the rest of the turn, this model can channel spells through the enemy model if it is in this model's control area and is not engaged. At the end of the turn, the enemy model is destroyed.

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: During this model's activation, when it makes an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

melee_weapon.name: Carcass
melee_weapon.capacity: When an attack with this weapon hits, this model can suffer 1 damage point to gain an additional die on the damage roll against the model hit. Life Trader can be used once per attack.

warlock.feat: Each time a friendly model destroys an enemy model while the friendly model is in Calaban's control area, Calaban gains 1 fury point. Immediately after resolving an attack in which a model in Calaban's control area destroys one or more enemy models, Calaban can cast one spell. Calaban can boost attack and damage rolls on spells cast as a result of Death Harvest. Death Harvest lasts for one turn.
warlock.spell: When this spell boxes a living or undead non-warcaster, non-warlock enemy warrior model, you can immediately make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a normal melee attack, then the boxed model is removed from play. The boxed model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

Target friendly model/unit gains +2 to melee attack rolls against living models. When an affected model boxes a living model with a melee attack, the boxed model is removed from play and this model heals d3 damage points.
Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.
Target friendly model/unit gains Stealth.
Target model/unit suffers –3 ARM and this model gains +1 ARM.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model can have only Minion Gatorman warbeasts in its battlegroup.

warlock.name: Dr. Arkadius

melee_weapon.name: Combat Syringe
melee_weapon.capacity: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following abilities:
A living model damaged by an attack with this weapon becomes stationary for one round.
A model damaged by an attack with this weapon cannot cast spells, upkeep spells, or use an animus for one round.

If an enemy non-warcaster, non-warlock model is damaged by an attack with this weapon, immediately after the attack is resolved take control of the model. You can immediately make a full advance with it followed by a normal melee attack, then Mind Control Serum expires. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.
Do not make damage rolls to resolve attacks made with this weapon. A living model hit by this weapon automatically suffers 1 damage point. This weapon cannot damage non-living models.

warlock.feat: Warbeasts in Arkadius' battlegroup can immediately frenzy. A model can frenzy even if it has already activated this turn and does not affect whether it can activate later this turn.
warlock.spell: While in this model's control area, friendly warbeasts gain Hyper Aggressive. (When a model with Hyper Aggressive suffers damage from an enemy attack anytime except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.)
Target model/unit suffers –2 SPD, STR, DEF, and ARM and cannot run or make special attacks.
Target friendly Faction warbeast gains +2 STR and DEF.

Choose a friendly Faction warbeast in this model's control area. Target an enemy model within 8" of the chosen warbeast and make a magic attack against it. The chosen warbeast is the attack's point of origin. If the enemy model is hit, it suffers a damage roll with a POW equal to the warbeast's base STR.
Each model in this model's battlegroup currently in its control area immediately heals d3+1 damage points. This spell can only be cast once per turn.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, and Skorne.
This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.

Once per turn during its activation this model can remove 1 fury point from a warbeast in its battlegroup that is in its control area and add 1 fury point to its own current total. The warbeast suffers d3 damage points.

warlock.name: Maelok the Dreadbound

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: This model can reave fury points from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon. Other models cannot reave fury points from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon.

warlock.feat: Friendly Faction models currently in Maelok's control area gain Incorporeal for one turn. While within Maelok's control area, friendly Faction undead models gain +2 ARM. Spirit World lasts for one round.
warlock.spell: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains + 2 ARM and Undead.
While within 2" of this model, enemy models suffer –2 DEF and ARM.
Return one destroyed friendly Faction Grunt to play with one unmarked damage box. It must be placed in this model's control area in formation and within 3" of another model in its unit.
Venom causes corrosion damage. Models hit suffer the Corrosion continuous effect.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model gains one soul token for each living enemy model destroyed within 2" of it. After this model leaches during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token on it with 1 fury point.
This model can have only Minion Gatorman warbeasts in its battlegroup.

warlock.name: Sturm & Drang

melee_weapon.name: Mechano Fist
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, instead of rolling damage normally you can choose to have this model throw the model hit. Treat the throw as if this model had hit with and passed the STR check of a throw power attack. The thrown model suffers a damage roll with POW equal to this model's STR plus the POW of the weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to this model's STR.

warlock.feat: Enemy warbeasts currently in Sturm & Drang's control area have their FURY reduced to 1, and enemy warjacks currently in Sturm & Drang's control area cannot be allocated more than 1 focus. While in Sturm & Drang's control area, enemy models cannot be used to channel spells. Psychic Apocalypse lasts for one round.
warlock.spell: While in this model's control area, friendly Faction warrior models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deflection lasts for one round.

Place target model completely within 2" of its current location. When Telekinesis targets an enemy model, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic attack roll. A model can be affected by Telekinesis only once per turn.
The next time target friendly Faction model is directly hit by an attack, it suffers no damage roll from the attack, then Vision expires.

When an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of this model, choose a warbeast in this model's battlegroup that is in its control area. That warbeast can immediately make a full advance and then can make one normal melee or ranged attack targeting the enemy model. The attack and damage rolls against that model are boosted. After the attack is resolved, Watcher expires.

Friendly Faction models beginning a charge in this model's control area gain Pathfinder. Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in this model's control area can charge or make slam power attacks against enemy models without being forced. Killing Ground lasts for one turn.
The force of this attacks blasts apart the earth itself.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
At the start of your Maintenance Phase, choose which mind is dominant: Sturm or Drang. Use that mind's stats and rules for one round.
This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.

melee_weapon.name: Mechano Fist
melee_weapon.capacity: See above.

model.capacity: This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.

When a warbeast in this model's battlegroup destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its combat action, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can force the warbeast to advance up to 2".
Living warbeasts in this model's battlegroup in its control area gain +2 on melee attack rolls.

warlock.name: Midas

melee_weapon.name: Bone Saw
melee_weapon.capacity: Immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy warbeast with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less or cast the destroyed warbeast's animus as a spell without spending fury.

warlock.feat: Midas spends any number of fury points when this feat is used. Return each destroyed warbeast from Midas' battlegroup to play within 3" of him with one unmarked damage box in each aspect. For each fury point spent remove 1 damage point from each model in Midas' battlegroup that is in his control area. Returned warbeasts gain Undead. Returned warbeasts cannot be forced this turn. Returned warbeasts that were destroyed this turn cannot activate the turn they are returned.
warlock.spell: A warlock leaching from target warbeast suffers 1 damage point for each fury leached. The affected warbeast cannot be healed or have damage transferred to it and loses Regeneration.
Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains Fearless and gains an additional die on melee damage rolls for one round.
Friendly models gain +2 to attack and damage rolls against target enemy model/unit.
Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
When this model hits a warbeast with a melee attack, roll an additional damage die.
This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.

When a living warbeast is destroyed or removed from play while within this model's control area, place one bone token on this model. Once per turn during this model's activation, you can remove up to three bone tokens from it. This model gains 1 fury point for each bone token removed.

RNG CMD. Target enemy model/unit. lf the model/unit is in range, it is cursed. A friendly Bone Grinder model charging a cursed model gains +2" movement. Friendly Bone Grinder models gain +2 to attack rolls against cursed models. Curse can be used once per activation and lasts for one turn.

warlock.name: Rask

ranged_weapon.name: Trident Cannon
ranged_weapon.capacity: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following abilities:

When this model hits another model with an attack, upkeep spells and animi on the model hit expire and it loses the focus points on it. When this model hits a warjack with an attack, that warjack suffers Disruption. (A warjack suffering Disruption loses its focus points and cannot be allocated focus or channel spells for one round.)
When this attack hits an enemy model with 1 or more focus or fury points on it, that model loses 1 focus or fury point and this model gains 1 fury point.
A living model hit by this weapon has its base DEF reduced to 7 and cannot run or charge. Paralysis lasts for one round.

warlock.feat: While in Rask's control area, friendly Faction models cannot be targeted by attacks or charges made by models more than 5" away from them. Dark Waters lasts for one round.
warlock.spell: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of target model in this model’s battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires. The affected model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.
During its activation, target friendly model can charge without spending focus or being forced and gains +2" movement and Pathfinder when it charges. Boundless Charge lasts for one turn.
Target friendly model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers –1 DEF.
While in this model's control area, enemy models treat open terrain as rough terrain. Inhospitable Ground lasts for one round.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model can have only Minion Gatorman warbeasts in its battlegroup.

If this model is disabled by an enemy attack, you can choose a non-disabled trooper model of the type indicated in its command range to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Call to Sacrifice, this model heals 1 damage point.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

warlock.name: Helga the Conqueror

melee_weapon.name: Hunting Spear
melee_weapon.capacity: When it hits a warbeast with this weapon, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the warbeast.
A model in this model's front arc suffers –2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack rolls against this model.

warlock.feat: While in Helga's control area, when a friendly Faction model hits an enemy model with a normal melee attack, the enemy model can be slammed d6" directly away from the attacking model. The POW of the slam damage roll is equal to the P+S of the attack. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of the attacking model. Grand Finale lasts for one turn.
warlock.spell: This model immediately makes a full advance. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. At the end of this movement, this model can make one melee attack against each model in its LOS that is in its melee range. Cyclone can be cast only once per turn.

While in this model's control area, friendly Faction warrior models cannot be targeted by free strikes. This model and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its control area gain +1 SPD. Dash lasts for one turn.
Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM.
Target enemy warrior model/unit cannot make ranged attacks and suffers –2 DEF and MAT for one round.
An enemy warbeast damaged by Muzzle cannot advance toward this model for one round.
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.

Models in this model's battlegroup gain Gang Fighter. (When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model, a model with Gang Fighter gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls.)

warlock.name: Jaga-Jaga, The Death Charmer

melee_weapon.name: Death Snake
melee_weapon.capacity: This attack ignores the Buckler and Shield weapon qualities and Shield Wall.
Gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against living models.

warlock.feat: When a living or undead enemy non-warlock, non-warcaster warrior model is boxed by an attack while in Jaga-Jaga's control area this turn, you can take control of it. If you do, the model becomes a friendly Faction Undead solo, gains Dark Shroud, heals 1 damage point, and can immediately make a full advance. During this movement, the model cannot be targeted by free strikes. The model cannot activate and is removed from play when Legion of Death expires. Legion of Death lasts for one round. (While in the melee range of a model with Dark Shroud, enemy models suffer –2 ARM.)
warlock.spell: When Deadweight destroys an enemy living or undead model, choose an enemy model within 2" of the destroyed model. The chosen model must forfeit either its movement or its action during its next activation, as its controller chooses.
Warjacks in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in its control area gain +2" movement. This model gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3" of it.

Target friendly model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. An affected model cannot be targeted by free strikes.)

Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Poltergeist. (When an enemy model misses the model with Poltergeist with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the enemy model d3" directly away from the model with Poltergeist.)

While within this model's control area, friendly Faction model/units' weapons gain Magical Weapon and Blessed. Spellpiercer lasts for one round. (When making an attack with a weapon with Blessed, ignore spell effects that add to a model's ARM or DEF.)
warlock.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model can have only Minion Gatorman warbeasts in its battlegroup.

warjack.name: Buccaneer

ranged_weapon.name: Net
ranged_weapon.capacity: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it is knocked down.

warjack.capacity: As part of a charge, after moving but before making its charge attack, this model can make one ranged attack targeting the model charged unless they were in melee with each other at the start of this model's activation. When resolving an Assault ranged attack, the attacking model does not suffer the target in melee penalty. If the target is not in melee range after moving, this model can make the Assault ranged attack before its activation ends.

warjack.name: Freebooter

melee_weapon.name: Clamp
melee_weapon.capacity: If this model hits the same model with both its initial attacks with this weapon, after resolving the attacks it can immediately make a double-hand throw, head-butt, headlock/weapon lock, push, or throw power attack against that target.
Gain an additional damage die againts knocked down targets.

melee_weapon.name: Clamp
melee_weapon.capacity: See above.
See above.

warjack.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely within deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

At the start of its activation, this model can spend 1 focus point to use Jury-Rigged. This model gains +2 SPD this activation. At the end of its activation, it suffers 1 damage point to its first available Movement system box. This model cannot use Jury-Rigged if its Movement system is crippled. Jury-Rigged can be used only once per activation.
This model and friendly warrior models B2B with it cannot be knocked down.

melee_weapon.name: Wrecker
melee_weapon.capacity: This attack ignores the Buckler and Shield weapon qualities and Shield Wall.
This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in its LOS and this weapon’s melee range.

warjack.name: Mariner

ranged_weapon.name: Ship Gun
ranged_weapon.capacity: This model must be in B2B with a friendly living Faction warrior model to make an attack with this weapon.

melee_weapon.name: Anchor
melee_weapon.capacity: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in its LOS and this weapon’s melee range.

warjack.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model and friendly warrior models B2B with it cannot be knocked down.

ranged_weapon.name: Steam Lobber
ranged_weapon.capacity: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

On a critical hit, instead of suffering a normal damage roll, each model in the AOE is thrown d6" directly away from the attacker regardless of its base size. Roll only once for all of the affected models. Move models farthest from the attacker first. The model directly hit by the attack suffers a POW 15 damage roll. Other models hit by the attack suffer a POW 8 damage roll. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the POW of the damage roll suffered by the thrown model.
This model can forfeit its movement to give this weapon +4 RNG this activation and gain the aiming bonus.

warjack.name: Rocinante
warjack.capacity: While in Damiano's control area, this model gains Quick Work. (When a model with Quick Work destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its combat action, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one normal ranged attack. Attacks gained from Quick Work do not count against a weapon's ROF.)
Once per turn, when an enemy model advances into and ends its movement in this model’s melee range, this model can immediately make one normal melee attack against it.

While this model is within 3" of its warcaster or warlock and is not knocked down or stationary, its warcaster cannot be targeted by free strikes and gains +2 DEF against melee attack rolls, and models attacking the warcaster do not gain back strike bonuses.

warjack.name: Rover
warjack.capacity: During its activation, this model can make melee attacks with its ranged weapon, with a 1/2" melee range. Do not add this model’s STR to damage rolls made with ranged weapons. Charge attacks made with ranged weapons are not boosted.

melee_weapon.name: Stun Lance
melee_weapon.capacity: This model gains +2 to charge attack rolls with this weapon.
A warjack hit by this attack suffers the Stall continuous effect. While a warjack is suffering Stall, its base DEF becomes 7 and it cannot run or charge.

warjack.name: Vanguard

melee_weapon.name: Guisarme
melee_weapon.capacity: A model in this model's front arc suffers –2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact rolls against this model.

warjack.capacity: As part of a charge, after moving but before making its charge attack, this model can make one ranged attack targeting the model charged unless they were in melee with each other at the start of this model’s activation. When resolving an Assault ranged attack, the attacking model does not suffer the target in melee penalty. If the target is not in melee range after moving, this model can make the Assault ranged attack before its activation ends.

Once per round, when a friendly model is directly hit by a ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 2" of this model, you can choose to have this model derectly hit instead.This model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. This model cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary.

warbeast.name: Gun Boar
warbeast.animus: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement in this model's command range, this model can make one normal melee or ranged attack targeting that model, then Counterblast expires. Counterblast lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: When this model is destroyed, each living warbeast B2B with it heals d3 damage points.
This model can be included only in a battlegroup controlled by a Minion Farrow warlock.

warbeast.name: War Hog

melee_weapon.name: Gore
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, the model hit is knocked down.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly model can charge without being forced. When the affected model destroys an enemy model with a charge attack, after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 1" and make an additional melee attack. Massacre lasts for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: This model can be forced during its activation to gain +2 STR for one turn but suffers d3 damage points.
This model can be included only in a battlegroup controlled by a Minion Farrow warlock.

warbeast.name: Blackhide Wrastler

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: On a hit, before rolling damage you can decide to knock down both this model and the model it hit. If both models are knocked down, this damage roll is boosted.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly knocked down Faction model immediately stands up.
warbeast.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model can charge living warrior models without being forced.
While knocked down, this model can make attacks, has a melee range, can engage other models, can be engaged, and can use its animus.
When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, this model can heal d3 damage points. If this model heals, the boxed model is removed from play.

warbeast.name: Bull Snapper

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: During this model's activation, when it make an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 ARM. If a warjack or warbeast hits the affected model with a melee attack, the attacking model suffers d3 damage points immediately after the attack has been resolved unless the affected model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack. Spiny Growth lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
When it charges a living model, this model gains +2" movement.
This model can charge living warrior models without being forced.
If this model destroys a living enemy model with a normal melee attack, this model's activation ends immediately after the attack is resolved and you can remove 1 fury point from this model.

warbeast.name: Ironback Spitter
warbeast.animus: This model gains Retaliatory Strike. Ornery expires after the affected model makes a Retaliatory Strike attack. Ornery lasts for one round. (When a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make one normal melee attack against that enemy model.)
warbeast.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
When a model hits this model with a free strike attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers d6 damage points.
This model does not suffer blast damage. Friendly models B2B with it do not suffer blast damage.

warbeast.name: Road Hog

melee_weapon.name: Gore
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, the model hit is knocked down.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly model gains Sprint. Lightning Strike lasts for one turn. (At the end of its activation, if a model with Sprint destroyed one or more enemy models with melee attacks this activation it can make a full advance.)
warbeast.capacity: As part of a charge, after moving but before making its charge attack, this model can make one ranged attack targeting the model charged unless they were in melee with each other at the start of this model's activation. When resolving an Assault ranged attack, the attacking model does not suffer the target in melee penalty. If the target is not in melee range after moving, this model can make the Assault ranged attack before its activation ends.
This model can be included only in a battlegroup controlled by a Minion Farrow warlock.
This model can be forced during its activation to gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn but suffers d3 damage points.

warbeast.name: Boneswarm
warbeast.animus: This model has concealment. Living enemy models suffer –2 to attack rolls while within 2" of this model. Swarm lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

This model gains a corpse token each time it destroys a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack. This model can have up to three corpse tokens at a time. For each corpse token on this model it gains +1 STR and ARM.
This model can be included only in a battlegroup controlled by a Minion Gatorman warlock.
During its activation, this model can spend corpse tokens to heal damage. For each corpse token spent, remove d3 damage from this model.

warbeast.name: Swamp Horror

melee_weapon.name: Beak
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

melee_weapon.name: Tentacles
melee_weapon.capacity: If this weapon hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base, immediately after the attack is resolved the hit model can be pushed any distance directly toward this model.

melee_weapon.name: Tentacles
melee_weapon.capacity: See above.

melee_weapon.name: Tentacles
melee_weapon.capacity: See above.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly Faction model's melee weapons gain Reach. Elasticity lasts for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
When this model is hit by a ranged attack, the attacker rolls one less damage die.
This model cannot be knocked down.

warbeast.name: Razor Boar

melee_weapon.name: Ripping Tusks
melee_weapon.capacity: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly Faction warbeast gains Hyper Aggressive for one round. (When a model with Hyper Aggressive suffers damage from an enemy attack anytime except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.)
warbeast.capacity: This model cannot make power attacks.
When this model is destroyed, each living warbeast B2B with it heals d3 damage points.

warbeast.name: Gorax(Arkadius)
warbeast.animus: Target friendly living warbeast gains +2 STR and MAT for one round and automatically frenzies during your next Control Phase.
warbeast.capacity: While damaged this model can charge or make power attacks without being forced.

warbeast.name: Lug

melee_weapon.name: Claw
melee_weapon.capacity: If this model hits the same model with both its initial attacks with this weapon, after resolving the attack it can immediately make a double-handed throw, head-butt, headlock/weapon lock, push, or throw power attack against the target.

melee_weapon.name: Claw
melee_weapon.capacity: See above.

warbeast.animus: When this model hits an enemy model with a normal melee attack, it can choose to knock down the enemy model or push it 3" directly away. Bear Hands lasts for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: This model is bonded to Brun Cragback. While it is within 3" of Cragback and is not stationary, Cragback cannot be targeted by free strikes and gains +2 DEF against melee attacks, and models do not gains back strike bonuses while attacking Cragback.
When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model within the melee range of a friendly model of the type indicated, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.
This model is included in any army that includes Brun Cragback. If Brun Cragback is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Cragback's battlegroup.

warbeast.name: Skarath
warbeast.qualification: Mercenary Minion Tatzylwurm Character Heavy Warbeast

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, if the attack hit a small-based non-warlock/warcaster model the model hit is removed from play.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly model gains Riposte. Serpent Strike lasts for one round. After the affected model makes a Riposte attack, Serpent Strike expires. (When a model with Riposte is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resoved it can make one normal melee attack against the attacking model.)
warbeast.capacity: This model is bonded to Dahlia Hallyr. When this model frenzies in Hallyr's control range, you choose the frenzy target.
This model cannot make slam or trample power attacks and cannot be knocked down.
This model is included in any army that includes Dahlia Hallyr. If Hallyr is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Hallyr's battlegroup.

warbeast.name: Brine
warbeast.qualification: Mercenary Minion Farrow Character Heavy Warbeast

melee_weapon.name: Gore
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, the model hit is knocked down.

warbeast.animus: This model gains an additional die on melee damage rolls against living models. When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, this model can heal d3 damage points. If this model heals, the boxed model is removed from play. Pig farm lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: If this model is destroyed by an enemy attack or if Rorsh is destroyed or removed from play by an enemy attack, before this model is removed from the table it can advance up to 3" and make one melee attack. When making this attack it ignore the effects of lost aspects. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

Brine is bonded to Rorsh. During its activation, this model can charge or make a slam power attack against an enemy model that was damaged by a melee or ranged attack made by Rorsh this turn without being forced.
While damaged this model can charge or make power attacks without being forced.
When this model is destroyed, each living warbeast B2B with it heals d3 damage points.
This model is included in any army that includes Rorsh. If Rorsh is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Rorsh's battlegroup.

warbeast.name: Snapjaw
warbeast.qualification: Mercenary Minion Gatorman Character Heavy Warbeast

melee_weapon.name: Tail
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, the model hit is knocked down.

warbeast.animus: This model cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and does not block LOS. Submerge lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: This model can charge living warrior models without being forced.

Snapjaw is bonded to Wrong Eye. When Snapjaw boxes a living model with a melee attack in Wrong Eye's control area, the model is removed from play and either Snapjaw or Wrong Eye heals d3 damage points.
This model is included in any army that includes Wrong Eye. If Wrong Eye is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Wrong Eye's battlegroup.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
When it charges a living model, this model gains +2" movement.

warbeast.name: Boneswarm (Midas - Butcher's Block)
warbeast.animus: This model has concealment. Living enemy models suffer –2 to attack rolls while within 2" of this model. Swarm lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

This model gains a corpse token each time it destroys a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack. This model can have up to three corpse tokens at a time. For each corpse token on this model it gains +1 STR and ARM.
This model can be included only in a battlegroup controlled by a Minion Gatorman warlock.
During its activation, this model can spend corpse tokens to heal damage. For each corpse token spent, remove d3 damage from this model.

battleEngine.name: Meat Thresher

ranged_weapon.name: Hailer
ranged_weapon.capacity: Make 2d3 ranged attacks targeting a primary target and any number of secondary targets within 2" of the first target. Ignore intervening models when declaring secondary targets. A secondary target cannot be targeted by more attacks than the primary target. Auto Fire counts as one attack for ROF.

melee_weapon.name: Crusher
melee_weapon.capacity: When this model makes its first melee attack during its activation, it makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in its LOS and this weapon's melee range.
This weapon gains an additional die on attack rolls against small-based models.
When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it is knocked down.
Gain an additional damage die against knocked down targets.

battleEngine.capacity: This model will work for Skorne, Trollbloods, and the Thornfall Alliance pact.

When this model advances into B2B contact with an enemy model during its activation, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per activation. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.
This model can make ride-by attacks.

This model can make melee and ranged attacks in the same activation. When this model makes its initial melee attacks or a power attack, it can also make its initial ranged attacks. This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee.

battleEngine.name: Sacral Vault

ranged_weapon.name: Spectral Fury
ranged_weapon.capacity: When this weapon boxes a living or Undead non-warcaster, non-warlock enemy warrior model, you can immediately spend one soul token to take control of the model and make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a normal melee attack, then the boxed model is removed from play. The boxed model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

When you decide to make initial attacks with this weapon at the beginning of this model's combat action, roll a d3. The total rolled is the number of initial attacks this model can make with this weapon during the combat action, ignoring ROF.

battleEngine.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, and the Blindwater Congregation pact.

This model can immediately negate any spell that targets it or a model within 3" of it by spending 1 soul token before the RNG of the spell is measured. The negated spell does not take effect, but its COST remains spent.

At the start of each of your Control Phases, this model gains d3 soul tokens if it does not have any. This model gains one soul token for each living model destroyed in its command range. This model can have up to five soul tokens at a time. During its activation, this model can spend soul tokens to boost attack or damage rolls at one token per boost.

If this model is in a friendly Faction warlock's control area, the warlock can remove 1 soul token from this model to gain a fury point. Each warlock can do this only once per turn and only during its activation.
While this model has one or more soul tokens, enemy models entering or ending their activations within 2" of it immediately suffer 1 damage point.

unit.name: Bog Trog Ambushers

melee_weapon.name: Fish Hook
melee_weapon.capacity: This model gains +2 to charge attack rolls with this weapon.

unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

You can choose not to deploy this unit at the start of the game. If it is not deployed normally, you can put it into play at the end of your Control Phases after your first turn. When you do, choose any table edge except the back of your opponent's deployment zone. Place all models in this unit in formation within 3" of the chosen table edge.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can take attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model gains an additional +2 DEF when benefiting from concealment or cover.

unit.name: Farrow Bone Grinders
unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model gains a cumulative +1 on magic attack rolls for each other model in this unit that is within 1" of it.
Arcane Bolt is a RNG 12, POW 11 magic attack.

This model casts the animus of one friendly destroyed warbeast as a spell without spending fury points. This model cannot cast an animus with a RNG of SELF. This model must make a special attack to cast an offensive spell. Other spells are cast by making a special action.

Target a friendly warlock within 3" of a model in this unit that is in formation. If the warlock is in range, when he casts a spell and is its point of origin, the spell gains +2 RNG. Spells with RNG SELF, SP, or CTRL are not affected. Craft Talisman lasts for one turn.

unit.name: Farrow Brigands
unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model gains cover, does not suffer blast damage, and does not block LOS. This model remains dug in until it moves, is placed, or is engaged. This model cannot dig into solid rock or man-made constructions. This model can begin the game dug in.
The Leader of this unit can recite one of the following prayers each turn anytime during its unit's activation. Each model in this unit gains the benefits listed.
Affected models gain Fearless and Tough for one round.

Affected models can make one ranged attack this activation before this unit makes its normal movement. After their normal movement, models in this unit that make combat actions can only make melee attacks this activation.
Affected models gain Pathfinder for one turn.

unit.name: Gatorman Posse
unit.capacity: This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
When it charges a living model, this model gains +2" movement.
The leader of this unit can recite one of the following prayers each turn anytime during its unit's activation. Each model in this unit gains the benefits listed.
Affected models can reroll misssed attack rolls against living models this turn. Each roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Cold Blood.
Affected models gain +1 DEF and Terror for one round.
Affected models gain Pathfinder for one turn.
While engaging an enemy model, this model gains +2 ARM.

unit.name: Swamp Gobber Bellows Crew
unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model gains an additional +2 DEF when benefiting from concealment or cover.

Models who received this order must forfeit their actions. After this unit's normal movement, place a 3" AOE cloud effect in play with its center point within 1" of the leader. If the Grunt is B2B with the Leader, place a 5" AOE instead. This AOE remains in play for one round.

unit.name: Farrow Razorback Crew

ranged_weapon.name: Razorback
ranged_weapon.capacity: This weapon cannot be used to make attacks or special actions during activations this model moves. This model cannot gain the aiming bonus when attacking with this weapon and cannot charge. If this model attacks with this weapon during its activation, it cannot attack with any other weapons that activation.
While B2B with one or more grunts in this unit, this model gains +2 to attack rolls with this weapon.

unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model gains cover, does not suffer blast damage, and does not block LOS. This model remains dug in until it moves, is placed, or is engaged. This model cannot dig into solid rock or man-made constructions. This model can begin the game dug in.

unit.name: Farrow Slaughterhousers

melee_weapon.name: Pole Cleaver
melee_weapon.capacity: This model gains +2 to charge attack rolls with this weapon.

unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model gains an additional die on damage rolls against damaged models.
Models disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.

unit.name: Gatorman Bokor and Bog Trog Swamp Shamblers
unit.full_name: Gatorman Bokor and Bog Trog Swamp Shamblers
unit.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

This model can remove friendly Swamp Shamblers in its command range from play to make an additional attack or to boost an attack or damage roll for each Swamp Shambler model removed. When this model would suffer damage, you can choose one or more models in this unit that are in this model's command range to suffer any number of those damage points instead, divided as you choose. If you do, this model does not suffer that damage. A model cannot suffer more damage as a result of Death Magic than it has unmarked damage boxes.
Hand of Glory is a RNG 3 magic attack. Target enemy model hit becomes stationary for one round.

When a living model is destroyed in this model's command range, this model gains one corpse token. At the end of your next Control Phase, remove all corpse tokens from this model and add one Swamp Shambler Grunt to this unit for each corpse token removed. Swamp Shambler Grunts must be placed in formation. This unit cannot have more than 20 Swamp Shambler Grunts in play at a time.

unit.name: Cylena Raefyll & Nyss Hunters
unit.capacity: These models will work for Cryx, Cygnar, Khador, and the Retribution.
These models will work for Circle and the Trollbloods.
This model cannot be included in an army that includes one or more models of the listed type.
While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Combined Ranged Attack.
This model ignores forests, concealment, and cover when determining LOS or making a ranged attack.

unit.name: Dannon Blythe & Bull
unit.capacity: These models will work for Cygnar, Khador, and the Protectorate.
These models will work for the Trollbloods.

After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this unit's prey. While this model is in play, each model in its unit beginning its activation within 10" of the prey gains +2" movement that activation. Whike this model is in play, models in its unit gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against the prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit as the prey.
Models disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.

ranged_weapon.name: Demolisher
ranged_weapon.capacity: Immediately after a normal attack with this weapon is resolved during this model's combat action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1'' directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1".
On a critical hit, the model hit is knocked down.

When you decide to make initial attacks with this weapon at the beginning of this model's combat action, roll a d3. The total rolled is the number of initial attacks this model can make with this weapon during the combat action, ignoring ROF.

melee_weapon.name: Great Sword
melee_weapon.capacity: Make a normal attack with this weapon. After resolving the attack, make one additional attack with this weapon.

unit.name: Greygore Boomhowler & Co.
unit.capacity: These models will work for Cryx, Cygnar, and Khador.
These models will work for the Trollbloods.
This model can make one of the following fell calls anytime during its unit's activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one fell call each turn.
When a model in this unit that is in formation makes a Tough roll of 4, 5 or 6, it heals 1 damage point and is knocked down. Call of Defiance lasts for one round.
Knocked down models in this unit in formation immediately stand up.
Enemy models/units currently in this model's command range must pass a command check or flee. Warjacks and Warbeasts currently in this model's command range suffer –2 to attack rolls for one round.

solo.name: Alten Ashley
solo.capacity: This model will work for Cygnar, Khador, and the Protectorate.
This model will work for Circle and Trollbloods.
This model gains an additional +2 DEF when benefiting from concealment or cover.
When this model hits a warbeast with an attack, the warbeast suffers d6 points of damage to a branch of your choice.
When this model destroys an enemy model with a normal ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

solo.name: Feralgeist
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

When a living warbeast in this model's command range is destroyed but not removed from play by an attack, this model can bind itself to the beast. If more than one eligible model attempts to bind to the warbeast, the closest model binds to it. If this model binds itself to the warbeast, the warbeast remains on the table and you take control of it. Remove this model from the table. The warbeast's controller can reave fury points on the warbeast and the warbeast is no longer destroyed. Fury points that are not reaved are removed. Any effects, spells, or animi on this model expire when it is removed. The warbeast becomes a friendly Minion, gains Undead, and no longer belongs to a battlegroup. Remove 1 damage point from each of the warbeast's aspects. The warbeast cannot activate the turn Spiritbind is used, cannot be forced or healed, and loses its animus. This model can exit the warbeast during your Maintenance Phase. If it does, place this model completely within 3" of the warbeast, then the warbeast is destroyed. If the warbeast is destroyed or removed from play while this model is bound to it, this model is forced to exit the warbeast.

solo.name: Gudrun the Wanderer
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model will work for Cryx, Cygnar, and Khador.

When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its combat action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.
Once per game during its activation, this model can use Binge Drinking. This model is knocked down.
This model cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks while knocked down.
The first time this model is disabled by an enemy attack, it heals all damage and is knocked down.

solo.name: Lanyssa Ryssyll

melee_weapon.name: Sorrow
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Immunity: Cold.

solo.capacity: This model will work for Cygnar and the Retribution.
This model will work for Circle and the Trollbloods.
This model cannot be included in an army that includes one or more models of the listed type.

Hunter's Mark is a RNG 10 magic attack that causes no damage. Friendly models can charge or make a slam power attack against an enemy model hit by Hunter's mark without being forced or spending focus. A friendly model charging an enemy model hit by Hunter's Mark gain +2" of movement. Hunter's Mark lasts for one round.
Ice Bolt is a RNG 10 magic attack. A model hit suffers a POW 12 cold damage roll. On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Immunity: Cold.
Enemy models that begin their activation in this model’s command range lose Eyeless Sight, Flight, and Pathfinder during their activations. Winter Storm lasts for one round.
This model gains Stealth while within terrain that provides concealment, the AOE of a spell that provides concealment, or the AOE of a cloud effect.
This model gains boosted attack and damage rolls against Legion or Blighted models.

solo.name: Viktor Pendrake

ranged_weapon.name: Chain Bola
ranged_weapon.capacity: If this model attacks with this weapon during its activation, it cannot attack with another ranged weapon that activation. If this model attacked with another ranged weapon this activation, it cannot attack with this weapon.
When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it is knocked down.

ranged_weapon.name: Lucky Bow
ranged_weapon.capacity: This model can reroll missed attack rolls with this weapon. Each attack roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Luck.

solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle and Trollbloods.
This model cannot be included in an army that includes one or more models of the listed type.
RNG 3. Target friendly warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains boosted attack rolls against warbeasts this turn.
When this model hits a warbeast with a melee attack, roll an additional damage die.
This model gains +4 DEF against melee and ranged attack rolls made by warbeasts. Warbeasts cannot target this model with free strikes.

solo.name: Saxon Orrik

melee_weapon.name: Skinning Knife
melee_weapon.capacity: When it hits a warbeast with this weapon, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the warbeast.

solo.capacity: This model will work for Cryx, Khador, and the Protectorate.
This model will work for Circle, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
When an enemy warbeast misses this model with a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can make one normal melee attack against the warbeast.
When this model hits a warbeast with a melee attack, roll an additional damage die.
RNG 5. Target friendly warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Pathfinder for one turn.
Models disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.

solo.name: Totem Hunter
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
This model ignores forests, concealment, and cover when determining LOS or making a ranged attack.

After using its normal movement to make a full advance but before performing an action, you can place this model anywhere completely within 5" of its current location. Any effects that prevent it from charging also prevent it from using Jump.

After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. This model gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against its prey. When this model begins its activation within 10" of its prey, it gains +2" movement that activation. When they prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.
At the end of this model's activation, if it destroyed one or more enemy models with melee attacks this activation it can make a full advance.

solo.name: Thrullg
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

When this model hits another model with an attack, upkeep spells and animi on the model hit expire and it loses the focus points on it. When this model hits a warjack with an attack, that warjack suffers Disruption. (A warjack suffering Disruption loses its focus points and cannot be allocated focus or channel spells for one round.)
When an enemy model casts a spell or uses an animus while in this model's command range, after the spell is cast the enemy model suffers 1 damage point and this model heals 1 damage point.
This model cannot be targeted by spells.

solo.name: Croak Hunter

ranged_weapon.name: Thrown Spear
ranged_weapon.capacity: Gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against living models.
Add this model's STR to the POW of this ranged attack.

melee_weapon.name: Spear
melee_weapon.capacity: See above.

solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model, this model gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls.
This model ignores forests, concealment, and cover when determining LOS or making a ranged attack.

If this model is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers the Corrosion continuous effect unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.

solo.name: Targ
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, it immediately makes one normal melee or ranged attack. A warbeast can make an Ancillary Attack special action only once per turn.
Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Minion warlock for the rest of the game. Each Minion warlock can have only one model attached to it.
While this model is in its warlock's control area, the warlock can force, leach, reave, heal, and transfer damage to the warbeasts in its battlegroup that are in this model's command range.
RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, it heals d3 damage points. A warbeast can be affected by Medicate only once per turn.

solo.name: Gatorman Witch Doctor
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.
This model can force friendly Faction warbeasts in its command range as if it were their controlling warlock.

Dominate Undead is a RNG 10 magic attack. Take control of target enemy non-warcaster, non-warlock undead model hit. You can immediately make a full advance with the undead model followed by a normal melee attack, then Dominate Undead expires. The undead model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

RNG CMD. Target a model in this model's LOS. If that model is in range, remove one friendly Faction trooper model within 1" of this model from play. The target model suffers a magical damage roll with POW equal to the base ARM of the removed model.
RNG 5. Target friendly non-warcaster, non-warlock warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Tough and Undead for one round.

solo.name: Gobber Tinker
solo.capacity: This model will work for Cygnar and Khador.
This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

This model can attempt repairs on any damaged friendly Faction warjack. To attempt repairs, this model must be B2B with the damaged warjack and make a skill check. If successful, remove d6 damage points from the warjack's damage grid.

During its activation, this model can make melee attacks with its ranged weapon, with a 1/2" melee range. Do not add this model's STR to damage rolls made with ranged weapons. Charge attacks made with ranged weapons are not boosted.
This model can attempt to repair friendly non-Faction warjacks and battle engines.

solo.name: Orin Midwinter, Rogue Inquisitor

melee_weapon.name: Void Staff
melee_weapon.capacity: When an enemy models casts a spell while within 12" of this model, this model gains one power token. It can have up to three power tokens at a time. During its activation, this model can spend power tokens to gain additional attacks or to boost attacks or damage rolls at one token per attack or boost.

solo.capacity: This model will work for Cryx, Khador, and the Protectorate.
This model will work for Skorne.

Arc Lightning is a RNG 10 magic attack. A model hit by this spell suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll, and lightning arcs from it to d3 consecutive additional targets. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to, ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll.
For one round, models cannot cast spells while within 12" of this model.
This model gains Stealth for one round.

solo.name: Eiryss, Mage Hunter of Ios
solo.capacity: This model will work for Cygnar, Khador, the Protectorate, and the Retribution.
Each time this model makes a normal ranged attack, choose one of the following abilities:
Instead of rolling damage, a model hit suffers 3 damage points. When damaging a warjack or warbeast, choose which column or branch suffers the damage.

A model hit loses all focus points. A model hit with the focus manipulation special rule does not replenish focus points next turn. A warjack hit suffers Disruption for one round. (A warjack suffering Disruption loses its focus points and cannot be allocated focus or channel spells for one round.)
This model ignores LOS when making ranged attacks. This model ignores concealment and cover when resolving ranged attacks.
This model gains an additional +2 DEF when benefiting from concealment or cover.
When this model ends its normal movement within 5" of a friendly non-myrmidon warjack, its activation ends immediately.
When included in a Retribution army, this model is a Retribution model instead of a Mercenary model.

solo.name: Raluk Moorclaw, the Ironmonger
solo.capacity: This model will work for Cryx, Cygnar, and Khador.
This model will work for Trollbloods and the Blindwater Congregation or Thornfall Alliance pacts.

As part of a charge, after moving but before making its charge attack, this model can make one ranged attack targeting the model charged unless they were in melee with each other at the start of this model's activation. When resolving an Assault ranged attack, the attacking model does not suffer the target in melee penalty. If the target is not in melee range after moving, this model must still make the Assault ranged attack before its activation ends.

This model can attempt to Drive each warjack under its control in its command range. To Drive a warjack, this model must make a command check at any time during its activation. If it passes, the warjack can make one ranged attack this activation before its normal movement. After its normal movement, the warjack can only make melee attacks that activation. If it fails, the warjack does not benefit from 'Jack Marshal' this turn.
This model can attempt to repair friendly non-Faction warjacks and battle engines.

This model can attempt repairs on any damaged friendly Faction warjack. To attempt repairs, this model must be B2B with the damaged warjack and make a skill check. If successful, remove d6 damage points from the warjack's damage grid.

solo.name: Brun Cragback
solo.spell: Enemy models roll one less die on attack rolls against this model. This model and friendly models B2B with it cannot be knocked down.
solo.capacity: These models will work for Searforge Commission.
These models will work for Circle and Trollbloods.
While B2B with Lug, this model can transfer damage to Lug without spending fury.
The only warbeast that can be in this model's battlegroup is Lug.
When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model within the melee range of a friendly model of the type indicated, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.
This model is not a warlock but has the following warlock special rules: Battlegroup Commander, Control Area, Damage Transference, Forcing, Fury Manipulation, Healing, and Spellcaster.

solo.name: Dahlia Hallyr
solo.spell: While in this model's control area, living enemy models cannot give or receive orders and cannot make melee or ranged attacks targeting this model.

Target model in this model's battlegroup gains Pathfinder and Prowl for one round. (Models with Prowl gain Stealth while within terrain that provides concealment, the AOE of a spell that provides concealment, or the AOE of a cloud effect.)
solo.capacity: These models will work for Retribution.
These models will work for Circle and Trollbloods.
When a friendly warbeast frenzies in this model's control area, the warbeast can forfeit its activation.
This model is not a warlock but has the following warlock special rules: Battlegroup Commander, Control Area, Damage Transference, Forcing, Fury Manipulation, Healing, and Spellcaster.
The only warbeast that can be in this model's battlegroup is Skarath.

solo.name: Rorsh
solo.spell: While within 3" of this model, enemy models treat open terrain as rough terrain.
solo.capacity: These model will work for Cryx, Cygnar, Khador and the Protectorate.
These model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne and Trollbloods.

This model gains cover, does not suffer blast damage, and does not block LOS. The model remains dug in until it moves, is placed, or is engaged. The model cannot dig into solid rock or man-made constructions. This model can begin the game dug in.

Center a 4" AOE on Rorsh. Models in the AOE other than Rorsh and Brine suffer a POW 6 blast damage roll. After these damage rolls are resolved, Rorsh can make a full advance. If Brine was in the AOE, it can make a full advance as well. They cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.
This model can have only Minion Farrow warbeasts in its battlegroup.
This model is not a warlock but has the following warlock special rules: Battlegroup Commander, Control Area, Damage Transference, Forcing, Fury Manipulation, Healing, and Spellcaster
If Brine is outside this model's control area during your Control Phase, before your models leach fury Brine can make a full advance directly toward this model.

solo.name: Wrong Eye

melee_weapon.name: Bite
melee_weapon.capacity: When it destroys a living enemy model with this weapon, immediately after the attack is resolved this model heals d3 damage points.

solo.spell: Take control of target enemy non-warcaster, non-warlock warrior model. The model immediately makes one normal melee attack, then Influence expires.
Choose one of target enemy warbeast's aspects. That aspect suffers the effects of being lost for one round. A warbeast cannot be destroyed as a result of Voodoo Doll.
solo.capacity: These models will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.
These models will work for Cryx.
This model is not a warlock but has the following warlock special rules: Battlegroup Commander, Control Area, Damage Transference, Forcing, Fury Manipulation, Healing, and Spellcaster.
This model can have only Minion Gatorman warbeasts in its battlegroup.

This model ignores the effects of deep and shallow water and can move through them without penalty. While completely in deep water, it cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks and can make attacks only against other models in deep water. While completely in deep water, this model does not block LOS.

solo.name: Efaarit Scouts

ranged_weapon.name: Heavy Hunting Rifle
ranged_weapon.capacity: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of models hit that have medium or larger bases. This weapon gains +2 to damage rolls against models with small bases.

solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Skorne, Trollbloods, and the Thornfall Alliance pact.
This model gains an additional +2 DEF when benefiting from concealment or cover.

When damaging a warjack or warbeast with a ranged attack, choose which column or branch suffers damage. Instead of rolling damage on a ranged attack, this model can inflict 1 damage point. A model that participates in a combined ranged attack loses Sniper until the attack is resolved.

solo.name: Maximus
solo.capacity: This model will work for Circle, Legion, Skorne, and Trollbloods.

When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its combat action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.
This model gains Pathfinder during activations it charges.
This model cannot be targeted by spells.
While engaging an enemy model, this model gains +2 ARM.
